DOC.brief_title: Protein Profile Immunoregulatory Factors Diabetic Cataract
DOC.detailed_description: The study compare level several immunoregulatory molecule ( vascular endothelial growth factor ( VEGF ) , monocyte chemotactic protein-1 ( MCP-1 ) , Fas Ligand ( FasL ) , interleukin-10 ( IL-10 ) interleukin-17 ( IL-17 ) ) serum aqueous humor type 2 diabetes mellitus patient , without clinically evident diabetic retinopathy diabetic macular edema , nondiabetic cataract patient . Investigators also investigate whether concentration immunoregulatory molecule significantly correlate intraoperative postoperative parameter . Particularly , investigator focus development corneal edema one main cause low visual acuity immediate postoperative period intraocular lens implantation . Since disturbed cytokine growth factor microenvironment diabetic eye may contribute increased frequency intraoperative postoperative intraocular lens ( IOL ) surgery complication , finding may relevant development therapeutic strategy aim restore protein profile immunoregulatory factor parallel cataract treatment .
